comment.author: 93013042@N00
comment._content:
Its amazing the sheer depth and quality in this photo and a lot of the collection.
You should all be very proud getting this on to the net, and more so for being net-savvy enough to use flickr as well as your own site.

comment.author: 35902265@N03
comment._content: Hi! I'm admin of a new group called Great Stock Shots We find your photo greatly suitable to our subject and would love to have it added to the group.

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Hi theodordh: We received your request to have a Library of Congress photo added to your group: Great Stock Shots. Please click on the "Invite this photo to..." link below the comment box and we'll accept it.

comment.author: 7211509@N04
comment._content: These photos are wonderful in quality and composition.

comment.author: 9590796@N06
comment._content: I am from the Chattanooga area, and this place still exists, although I am sure it's under a different name.  It is cool to see something like this and know EXACTLY where it took place!

comment.author: 9590796@N06
comment._content: Here's theplace on GoogleMaps: maps.google.com/maps?q=chattanooga&oe=utf-8&clien... it's next to the river!
